content: a little starter sweater for baby knitted in basic stocking stitch with raglan sleeves using simple increasing and decreasing and with garter stitch hem and cuffs make it in four row stripes in two colours or alternatively make it in a solid colour with a shy little rabbit motif worked in intarsia **materials** erika knight for john lewis baby double knit wool 100% pure wool approx 110m per 50g ball stripe sweater a 2 2 2 2 x 50g balls col soft grey 31 b 2 2 2 2 x 50g balls col ecru 01 rabbit motif sweater a 2 3 3 3 x 50g balls col mineral 09 or dusky pink 21 b small amount col ecru 01 3 75mm and 4mm knitting needles large-eyed blunt tipped sewing needle **size** to fit approx age 0-3mths 3-6mths 6-9mths 9-12mths actual chest 45 5cm 49cm 52 5cm 56cm length 24cm 26cm 28cm 30cm sleeve length 10 5cm 13cm 14 5cm 16 5cm
